ACC-R.BK.long_name: Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited
ACC-R.BK.summary: Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes ceiling fans in Thailand. The company offers ceiling fans under the Air-Le-Gance, Compass East, and Sunlight brands; and LED decoration lamp under the Lumos brand, as well as accessories. It is also involved in the property development and renting activities. In addition, the company invests in business of electricity production from solar power; operates a solar roof power plant; and engages in the financing and factoring business. The company was formerly known as Compass East Industry (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited in November 2015. Advanced Connection Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BJC-R.BK.summary: Berli Jucker Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and services in the areas of packaging, consumer, healthcare and technical, modern retail supply chain, and other group businesses in Thailand. It designs, manufactures, markets, and distributes glass and plastic packaging products, and aluminum cans. It is involved in the distribution of personal care products, including Cellox facial tissues and toilet papers, Zilk toilet papers, Maxmo multi-purpose papers, Tasto potato chips, Dozo rice crackers, Party and Campus extruded snack, Parrot soap, and Dermapon baby soap; as well as provides logistics management services, such as warehouse, transportation, customs brokerage, and freight forwarding representative services. In addition, it offers food products comprises snacks, beverages, packaged fruits, and dairy and yogurt products; and non-food products, which includes personal care, household products, stationery and office equipment, and others. Further, it imports and distributes medicines, medical supplies, cosmeceuticals, pharmaceuticals, food supplements, and health products; medicines for treatment of various diseases such as kidney, hematology, cardiovascular, endocrine system, oncology and tumors, urology, medicine for children, and beauty products; digital mammography system, computed tomography scans, magnetic resonance imaging, and ultrasound systems; surgical microscopes; and automated external defibrillators, and CPR training learning tools for medical personnel. Additionally, it engages in bakery, food and nutraceutical, and cosmetic ingredients; industrial chemicals and refrigerants; e-commerce business; consultancy, design, installation, and the after-sales services for cranes and solar rooftop system; and industrial weighing machine and weighing control system. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Berli Jucker Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TCC Corporation Company Limited.

ETE-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Technical Engineering Public Company Limited
ETE-R.BK.summary: Eastern Technical Engineering Public Company Limited provides installation services for electricity transmission and telecommunication networks primarily in Thailand. The company offers management and construction services; operates a solar power plant; and trades in safety equipment. It also provides personnel outsourcing and work force services, as well as engages in the engineering business. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LOXLEY-R.BK.summary: Loxley Public Company Limited engages in the trading and turnkey contract sales of telecommunication equipment and other products in Thailand. The company operates through six segments: Information Technology Business Group, Food Services & Distribution Business Group, Energy Business Group, Network Solutions Business Group, Services Business Group, and Special and Other Businesses. It is involved in the trading of computers and computer programs; service of information technology equipment and computer systems; sale and service of prepaid electronic cash cards; power system business; trading and installation of elevators and escalators; manufacture and distribution of citrus essential oil and electricity; renting of buildings and advertising boards; and planning, designing, installing, and construction of solar power plants; and sale of consumer products. The company also provides airport and other security; telecommunication and computerized database; submarine cable network; recruitment, personnel development, training, and other related; personal healthcare; engineering services for telecommunication network systems; distributes and provides advance security equipment and solutions; and wholesales raw materials and food supply. In addition, it is involved in the manufacture, assembly, and trading of electricity automotive; sale, service, and installation of automatic telephone switching systems; and IT infrastructure improvement projects. Further, the company manufactures, assembles, rents, leases, imports, and exports vehicles and spare parts; imports, exports, and distributes virtual learning services and system development; and manufactures and installs compressors, steam generators, pressure tanks, filters, and conveyor belts. The company was formerly known as Loxley (Bangkok) Company Limited and changed its name to Loxley Public Company Limited in April 1993. Loxley Public Company Limited was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NNCL-R.BK.summary: Nava Nakorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops properties and industrial promotion zone projects for trading and leasing in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Real Estate Business and Utilities Services Business. It also provides utilities and other facilities services in the industrial promotion zone. Nava Nakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Khlong Luang, Thailand.

NNCL.BK.summary: Nava Nakorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops properties and industrial promotion zone projects for trading and leasing in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Real Estate Business and Utilities Services Business. It also provides utilities and other facilities services in the industrial promotion zone. Nava Nakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Khlong Luang, Thailand.

NYVU.F.long_name: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited
NYVU.F.summary: Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a shipping service company in Thailand and internationally. It operates through four segments: Shipping, Offshore Service, Agrochemical, and Investment. The company offers dry bulk shipping services that carry iron ores, coal, grains, cements, fertilizers, and steel and forest products; ship agency and ship brokerage services; and operates dry bulk vessels for tramp services. It also provides offshore services to the oil and gas industry; and produces and markets NPK compounds, bulk blending products, and fertilizers under the Stork brand for customers' needs for coffee, rice, rubber, vegetables, and various other crops. In addition, the company owns and operates Phu My port in South Vietnam; and provides ship supplies and logistics services, including supply of ship stores, cargo dunnage materials, cargo lashing and securing equipment, cargo handling equipment, tally and checker services, forklift rental/services, and warehouses and storage spaces for rental, as well as material procurement, management, and distribution services. Further, it offers cargo loading and unloading, cargo handling, and transportation services; owns and operates a fleet of nine petroleum tankers/barges and one liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) tanker; transporting fuel, such as petroleum, ethanol, and LPG products to various ports/depots; provides water and coal supply chain management services, as well as pipeline installation and repair services; produces and distributes canned food and fruit beverage; and operates and franchises Pizza Hut and Taco Bell restaurants. Additionally, the company trades in wood pellets and fertilizers; acts as a ship agent; provides property management and drilling services; road transportation services; produces and sells treated water; and engages in the lifestyle and entertainment businesses. The company was founded in 1904 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SUC-R.BK.summary: Saha-Union Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, invests in textiles, plastic, rubber and metal, trading, energy, real estate, and hotel businesses in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Textile; Plastic, Rubber and Metal; Trading; Energy; Hotel; and Investment and Others segments. It is involved in the contract manufacture and distribution of textile products and garments, including sewing accessories, such as zippers, threads, and buttons; cotton, polyester cotton, and/or other synthetic fiber for preparing workwear and fabric used in other industries; fashion clothing and workwear; and clean room garments. The company also manufactures and distributes rubber, elastic products, plastic products, vacuum bottles, and stainless steel kitchenware; manufactures and repairs molds; and operates as a distributor and dealer of components of infrastructure for data center, operating systems, virtual environment, application software, security control, computer and accessories, etc. In addition, it generates electricity through cogeneration power plants; operates the Hilton Hua Hin Resort and Spa, a five star hotel comprising 296 rooms in Hua Hin Town, as well as rubber estates; and provides dormitory rental and services. Further, the company invests in chemical and hospital business. Saha-Union Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SUC.BK.summary: Saha-Union Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, invests in textiles, plastic, rubber and metal, trading, energy, real estate, and hotel businesses in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures and distributes rubber, elastic products, plastic products, vacuum bottles, and stainless steel kitchenware; manufactures and repairs molds; and operates as a distributor and dealer of components of infrastructure for data center, operating systems, virtual environment, application software, security control, computer and accessories, etc. In addition, it generates electricity through cogeneration power plants; operates the Hilton Hua Hin Resort and Spa, a five star hotel comprising 296 rooms in Hua Hin Town, as well as rubber estates; and provides dormitory rental and services. Further, the company invests in chemical and hospital business. Saha-Union Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TAPAC-R.BK.summary: Tapaco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic and assembly parts for electrical and electronic products in Thailand, Sweden, and internationally. The company offers engineering plastic parts comprising semi-finished drive units, fax cover frames, fax bases, multi-function office equipment, and wireless handset bodies for fax machines; black-and-white and color photosensitive drums, laser printing machines, parts of laser printers, inkjet printers, mobile printers, etc. for printing and photocopying machines; tape driving and holding parts, CD grips, turn tables, etc. for car audio equipment; and other plastic parts that are used to manufacture household electrical appliances, such as refrigerators, air conditioners, auto parts, etc. It also manufactures plastic injection molds; and provides repair, maintenance, and modification services for plastic injection molds. In addition, the company is involved in the residential construction; investment, development, and sale of real estate properties; and cosmetic retailing business. Tapaco Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TAPAC.BK.summary: Tapaco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic and assembly parts for electrical and electronic products in Thailand, Sweden, and internationally. In addition, the company is involved in the residential construction; investment, development, and sale of real estate properties; and cosmetic retailing business. Tapaco Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
